comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: There's a Miss Emily Randolph of Philadelphia mentioned in New York Times articles dated 1910 and 1911, she's a 'society woman' who apparently excelled at playing polo.

comment.author: 14184510@N07
comment._content: Yes, she was my grandmother; a great athlete, and a fine artist.

comment.author: 25229859@N05
comment._content: Bonjour, je suis un administrateur du groupe 30's "ART DECO period", et nous aimerions beaucoup que vous ajoutiez votre photo à notre groupe.
